verses.verse: And <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> being full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> returned <WG5290> <WG5656> from <WG575> Yarden <WG2446>, and <WG2532> was led <WG71> <WG5712> by <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048>,

Being <WG3985> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> tempted <WG3985> <WG5746> of <WG5259> the devil <WG1228>. And <WG2532> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> he did eat <WG5315> <WG5627> nothing <WG3756> <WG3762>: and <WG2532> when they <WG846> were ended <WG4931> <WG5685>, he afterward <WG5305> hungered <WG3983> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> the devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> <WG5748> the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, command <WG2036> <WG5628> this <WG5129> stone <WG3037> that <WG2443> it be made <WG1096> <WG5638> bread <WG740>.

If <WG1437> thou <WG4771> therefore <WG3767> wilt worship <WG4352> <WG5661> me <WG1799> <WG3450>, all <WG3956> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> thine <WG4675>.

And <WG2532> the fame <WG2279> of <WG4012> him <WG846> went out <WG1607> <WG5711> into <WG1519> every <WG3956> place <WG5117> of the country round about <WG4066>.

And <WG1161> when it was <WG1096> <WG5637> day <WG2250>, he departed <WG1831> <WG5631> and went <WG4198> <WG5675> into <WG1519> a desert <WG2048> place <WG5117>: and <WG2532> the people <WG3793> sought <WG2212> <WG5707> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> <WG5627> unto <WG2193> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> stayed <WG2722> <WG5707> him <WG846>, that he should not <WG3361> depart <WG4198> <WG5738> from <WG575> them <WG846>.
